plot: England is in peril and a small band of insane asylum inmates with superpowers assemble in a tin hut to save the day - but have the government really called them and does the enemy really exist? One room. Six crazies. A whole lot of weird.
title: Hexagon
plot_es: England is in peril and a small band of insane asylum inmates with superpowers assemble in a tin hut to save the day - but have the government really called them and does the enemy really exist? One room. Six crazies. A whole lot of weird.
plot_en: England is in peril and a small band of insane asylum inmates with superpowers assemble in a tin hut to save the day - but have the government really called them and does the enemy really exist? One room. Six crazies. A whole lot of weird.
